searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT base.PKID, base.CASE_CODE, base.CTM_CODE, base.PROPERTY_ADDR, base.AGENT_NAME, base.AGENT_CODE, o4.ORG_NAME AGENT_ORG_NAME, base.AGENT_PHONE, base.GRP_NAME, base.LEADING_PROCESS_ID AS LEADING_PROCESS_ID_OLD, u1.REAL_NAME LEADING_PROCESS_ID, base.ORG_ID AS ORG_ID_OLD, mortgage.MORT_TYPE AS MORT_TYPE_OLD, mortgage.SIGN_DATE, ISNULL(mortgage.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, ISNULL(mortgage.COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT, ISNULL(mortgage.PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT, mortgage.FIN_ORG_CODE, ts1.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC FIN_ORG_NAME_YC, ts2.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC FIN_ORG_NAME, mortgage.loanlost_apply_reason, mortgage.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, o2.ORG_NAME ORG_NAME, o3.ORG_NAME ORG_ORG_NAME, WK.TASK_DEF_KEY_, WK.END_TIME_, WK.START_TIME_, WK.real_name, (SELECT SU.ORG_ID FROM sctrans.SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.ID=base.AGENT_CODE AND SU.IS_DELETED=0) ORG_ID FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE mortgage INNER JOIN sctrans.V_CASE_LIST_BASE base ON mortgage.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user u1 on base.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u1.id and u1.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user u2 on base.AGENT_CODE = u2.id and u2.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_org o1 on u1.org_id = o1.id LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_org o2 on mortgage.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM = o2.id LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_org o3 on mortgage.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM = o3.id and o3.PARENT_ID IN ('FF5BC56E0E4B45289DAA5721A494C7C5','8a8493d453141f3301532c9568011af9','d5878adf8b0c4032aeae895c701ed693','de81a98a8ec341caa8e9bc77c46cd370','54b3233fdf994d9987e7c8febc223588','960089538bc54a9a9139ef52ceb45b33','6114AB949B4445828D4383977C4FAC71','6a84979158b942b78a8a5921cc30b8c3') LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_org o4 on u2.org_id = o4.id LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG ts1 on mortgage.FIN_ORG_CODE = ts1.FIN_ORG_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG ts2 on ts1.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE= ts2.FIN_ORG_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT W.CASE_CODE, taskInst.TASK_DEF_KEY_, (SELECT TOP 1 aht.END_TIME_ FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST aht WHERE aht.task_def_key_='LoanlostApproveDirector' AND aht.PROC_INST_ID_=taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY aht.id_ desc) END_TIME_, taskInst.START_TIME_, guser.real_name FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW w INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST taskInst ON taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ = w.INST_CODE AND taskInst.task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector') AND taskInst.ID_ = (SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ and DELETE_REASON_='completed' AND task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector')) INNER JOIN sctrans.sys_user guser ON guser.username = taskInst.ASSIGNEE_ AND guser.available = '1' AND guser.is_deleted = '0' AND w.STATUS IN ('0', '4') AND w.PKID = (select max(PKID) from sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW WHERE CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND STATUS IN ('0', '4')) ) AS WK ON WK.CASE_CODE = mortgage.CASE_CODE
WHERE mortgage.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND mortgage.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 0 AND (mortgage.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002','') OR mortgage.MORT_TYPE IS NULL)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy orgHierarchy ON orgHierarchy.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID WHERE C.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND (orgHierarchy.TEAM_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.DISTRICT_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.hq_id=#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> )
<ifNotNull idflag> AND (mortgage.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# or (mortgage.LOAN_AGENT is null and mortgage.CREATE_BY = #userId#) ) </ifNotNull> <if test="srvCode!=null"> AND ( 1=2 <if test="srvCode.contains('NULL')"> or (mortgage.MORT_TYPE ='' or mortgage.mort_type is null) </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016001')"> or ( mortgage.mort_type ='30016001') </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016002')"> or ( mortgage.mort_type ='30016002') </if> ) </if>

SELECT base.CASE_PKID PKID, base.CASE_CODE, base.CTM_CODE, base.HOUSR_PROPERTY_ADDR PROPERTY_ADDR, base.AGENT_NAME, base.AGENT_CODE, base.GRP_NAME, base.AGENT_PHONE, base.GRP_NAME AS AGENT_ORG_NAME, base.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F AS LEADING_PROCESS_ID_OLD, base.CASE_REAL_NAME_F AS LEADING_PROCESS_ID, base.CASE_ORG_ID_F AS ORG_ID_OLD, base.MORT_TYPE AS MORT_TYPE_OLD, base.MORT_TYPE_CN AS MORT_TYPE, base.MORT_SIGN_DATE AS SIGN_DATE, ISNULL(base.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, ISNULL(base.MORT_COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT, ISNULL(base.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT, base.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE AS FIN_ORG_CODE, base.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME AS FIN_ORG_NAME, base.MORT_FIN_SUB_BRANCH_NAME AS FIN_ORG_NAME_YC, base.LOAN_LOST_APPLY_REASON AS loanlost_apply_reason, base.LOAN_AGENT_ORG_ID AS LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, base.LOAN_AGENT_ORG_NAME AS ORG_NAME, wk.TASK_DEF_KEY_, wk.END_TIME_, wk.START_TIME_, wk.real_name, base.GRP_CODE FROM sctrans.T_RPT_CASE_BASE_INFO base with(nolock) LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE m with(nolock) ON m.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE AND m.IS_ACTIVE = '1'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT W.CASE_CODE, taskInst.TASK_DEF_KEY_, (SELECT TOP 1 aht.END_TIME_ FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST aht WHERE aht.task_def_key_='LoanlostApproveDirector' AND aht.PROC_INST_ID_=taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY aht.id_ desc) END_TIME_, taskInst.START_TIME_, guser.real_name FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW w with(nolock) INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST taskInst ON taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ = w.INST_CODE AND taskInst.task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector') AND taskInst.ID_ = (SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ and DELETE_REASON_='completed' AND task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector')) INNER JOIN sctrans.sys_user guser with(nolock) ON guser.username = taskInst.ASSIGNEE_ AND guser.available = '1' AND guser.is_deleted = '0' AND w.STATUS IN ('0', '4') AND w.PKID = (select max(PKID) from sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW WHERE CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND STATUS IN ('0', '4')) ) AS WK ON WK.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE
WHERE base.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 0 AND (base.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002','') OR base.MORT_TYPE IS NULL)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy orgHierarchy ON orgHierarchy.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID WHERE C.CASE_CODE = base.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND (orgHierarchy.TEAM_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.DISTRICT_ID=#queryorgs# or orgHierarchy.hq_id=#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> )
<ifNotNull idflag> AND (base.LOAN_AGENT_USER_ID = #userId# or (base.LOAN_AGENT_USER_ID is null and m.CREATE_BY = #userId#) ) </ifNotNull> <if test="srvCode!=null"> AND ( 1=2 <if test="srvCode.contains('NULL')"> or (base.MORT_TYPE ='' or base.mort_type is null) </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016001')"> or ( base.mort_type ='30016001') </if> <if test="srvCode.contains('30016002')"> or ( base.mort_type ='30016002') </if> ) </if>

column.name: ORG_ORG_NAME
column.title: 主办人所属贵宾服务部
